GK19gp23-33u:324: tad ācarya ca tad-bandhūnām andhāyamānānām api tad-anveṣaṇa-nirbandhād bhayaṃ vicārya sāmarṣam iva vivakṣitam uvāca-katham iha tat-tad-bhayaṃ kurutha iti |
GK19gp23-33u:325: atra ca ṣaṣṭhī pañcamī vā samasyate |
GK19gp23-33u:326: [63] kiṃ cātra khaṇḍam akhaṇḍaṃ ca padyaṃ yathāyatham anūḍhā ūḍhābhāsāś ca tā dṛṣṭvācaṣṭeti gamyate |
GK19gp23-33u:328: ūḍhābhāsāḥ pratiśrūyante' pi tanūjā ity antam |
GK19gp23-33u:331: dṛṣṭaṃ yad-vanam aty apūrva-kusumair divyartunā pūjitaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:332: dyotaiś carcitam indunā yamunayā cātmānilair nartitam |
GK19gp23-33u:334: tasmād etad abhāvatas tu va iha stavyā na vāstavyatā ||JGc_1,23.49||
GK19gp23-33u:340: [65] tataḥ kaṣṭa-sādhyaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ bādhyamānaṃ vidhāyātrāvikala-sarva-dharma-phale mama sukha-vihāra-sthale praviśata |
GK19gp23-33u:341: [66] anyathā punar udyad-vidhu-vanam idaṃ bhavatīnāṃ vidhuvanāya sampatsyata iti yācñā-pakṣābhiprāyaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:343: aham ahaha na budhye smeti pūrvaṃ pralāpaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:344: cakara tad iha yūyaṃ tad vicārya kṣamadhvam |
GK19gp23-33u:346: tad-ucitam akhilaṃ yat snigdhatā mayy upaiti ||JGc_1,23.51||
GK19gp23-33u:347: tad api na yadvad virahe prītis tadvan na sānnidhye
GK19gp23-33u:348: bhavati tato gṛha-yānaṃ bhavatīnām aucitīṃ cinute ||JGc_1,23.52||
GK19gp23-33u:349: [68] atra ca prīti-viṣayād dūre sthitir na yukteti virodhi-lakṣaṇayā yācñāpakṣaḥ saṅgamyate | tataś ca-
GK19gp23-33u:350: pūrvaṃ yac cirataḥ spṛhāvalanayā saṃkptam āsīt punar
GK19gp23-33u:351: vaṃśyākāraṇayā balād upacitaṃ tad bhagnam uccair yataḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:352: tac chrutvā dayitād vyalīka-vacanaṃ bāḍhaṃ na niścikyire
GK19gp23-33u:353: kiṃ na smaḥ kim u vā sma ity aḸ tadā gopāla-vāma-bhruvaḥ ||JGc_1,23.53||
GK19gp23-33u:354: tad āsāṃ niścalāṅgīnāṃ kāñcīnām api rājayaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:355: samaṃ samantataḥ kleśāt tūṣṇīkām eva saṅgatāḥ ||JGc_1,23.54||
GK19gp23-33u:358: manye hṛdayāmbhoruha-nivahaḥ svarasān muhuś ca susrāva ||JGc_1,23.55||
GK19gp23-33u:362: kṛṣṇāṃ viśāma ca na vā kaṭhināyamānam
GK19gp23-33u:367: priye rūkṣe jātā dalayitum amūr āvavṛtire
GK19gp23-33u:372: sphuran niśi ca tāmasīr iva cacāya tasmin hariḥ ||JGc_1,23.58||
GK19gp23-33u:378: [72] tad evaṃ kṣobhe sati dāḍimād antaḥ-sakta-rakta-bījānām iva nijānāṃ bhāvānāṃ hṛdayān niṣkulākṛtiḥ svayam eva jātā,
GK19gp23-33u:379: tathāpi vaidagdhī-digdhatayā priya-gīrvad eva sandigdham ūcuḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:381: iyam iva mā kuru punar ativādam |
GK19gp23-33u:384: pati-putrādika-bhajanam ihādhikam iti yaṃ vadasi vicāram |
GK19gp23-33u:385: sa tvayy eva hi tiṣṭhatu na tu bahir iti vimṛśāmaḥ sāram ||JGc_1,23.60||
GK19gp23-33u:386: anayor artha-śleṣo' yam ubhayam eva pakṣaṃ viśeṣayati |
GK19gp23-33u:387: atha dhava-suta-mukha-gaṇatas tava sukham asti satāṃ hṛdi yātam |
GK19gp23-33u:388: tad api ca na hi bhavad-anusaraṇaṃ bhavad-icchati yuvatī-jātam ||JGc_1,23.61||
GK19gp23-33u:389: atra sandigdha-kāku-padaṃ nahīti padaṃ tad-icchā-nirdhāraṇe, yad vā niṣedhe-
GK19gp23-33u:390: svām āśām anuvardhaya vara-tanu-tatir iha labhatāṃ śātam |
GK19gp23-33u:393: gṛha-karmāṇy anucittaṃ sukha-tanu bhavatā nahy apinaddham |
GK19gp23-33u:394: caraṇau pracalata iha na ca valataḥ pratigamanaṃ kila baddham ||JGc_1,23.63||
GK19gp23-33u:395: atra sukha-tanv iti bhavatety asya cittam ity asya vā viśeṣaṇam |
GK19gp23-33u:396: apinaddham iti bandhanābhāve bandhane vā na ceti pūrva-nahi-vat |
GK19gp23-33u:399: nāśaya yadi na hi mādṛśam api sa hi saṅkramitā sakhideva ||JGc_1,23.64||
GK19gp23-33u:400: atra svabhaveti kāme svajāte vā | mādṛśam ity asmat-sadṛśe vā jane' smad-arthe vā |
GK19gp23-33u:401: lakṣmī-sukha-dadam api bhavataḥ padam ahaha pulindī-bhavyam |
GK19gp23-33u:402: spṛṣṭaṃ yad-avadhi dṛṣṭaṃ tad-avadhi sarvaṃ jagad-apasavyam ||
GK19gp23-33u:404: atrāpasavyaṃ pratikūlam ity ubhaya-pakṣe' pi samañjasam |
GK19gp23-33u:406: lakṣīr vrajam anu tulasī-vanam anu bhavad-udaya-sphurad-udayā |
GK19gp23-33u:407: dṛśyata iti tava pada-dhūlyāplavam icchaty api pati-hṛdayā ||
GK19gp23-33u:410: tadvad vayam api hṛdi vāñchām api nahyāmaḥ savitānam ||JGc_1,23.67||
GK19gp23-33u:411: atrāpi-śabdaḥ samuccaye pūrvavat kākvā niṣedhe vā |
GK19gp23-33u:412: tattvaṃ sukṛpaya kṛta-vṛjinātyaya tava yāś caraṇe raktāḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:416: dattābhaya-bhuja-vakṣaḥ-śrī-yuja dāsyo vayam api te' tra ||JGc_1,23.69||
GK19gp23-33u:418: tava muralī-kalam api ca rūpa-balam anubhūyābhavad eva |
GK19gp23-33u:419: druma-kulam api pulakāṅkura-saṅkulam iha kā nārī deva ||JGc_1,23.70||
GK19gp23-33u:421: vyaktaṃ vraja-bhaya-hara-līlā-caya devas tvam asi sa ko' pi |
GK19gp23-33u:422: tan no nija-karam api śirasi ca dhara dāsīnāṃ bhramato' pi ||JGc_1,23.71||
GK19gp23-33u:424: tathā vilāpa-tāpena na tāsāṃ vivyathe hariḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:428: pratisvam anayat priyā druta-matiḥ sva-pārśvaṃ balī
GK19gp23-33u:429: balād api balānujo valayati sma līlāṃ prati ||JGc_1,23.73||
GK19gp23-33u:430: āmṛśann aṅgulīḥ pāṇiṃ prakoṣṭhaṃ bāhum apy atha |
GK19gp23-33u:433: yad api ca rādhā tāsu svam abhijugopāyutādi-saṅkhyāsu |
GK19gp23-33u:434: tad api ca hariṇā spaṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭā tārāsu candralekheva ||
GK19gp23-33u:437: ativismitaye jajñe tarhi ca sā tatra candralekheva ||JGc_1,23.76||
GK19gp23-33u:438: gopyaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ tatra kṛṣṇaś ca rādhām
GK19gp23-33u:442: [74] tatra kāścid bhūrur iva nibhālya vana-mālyaḥ parīhāsataḥ parasparam ūcuḥ-
GK19gp23-33u:443: jalade vilasati vidyud bibhyati hṛdayāni bhīrūṇām |
GK19gp23-33u:444: kiṃ parihasasi sakhi tvaṃ kiṃ na hi paśyasi puraś citram ||JGc_1,23.78||
GK19gp23-33u:450: īdṛg apyayi rādhe yas tāsāṃ mukha-nirīkṣakaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:473: priyaṃ niyutaśo' py amūr na hi vilokamānāḥ samaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:474: nimeṣam upasedire yad iyam eva divyā sthitiḥ |

GK19gp23-33u:478: yathā dṛśāṃ diśi diśi tā dadhur muhus
GK19gp23-33u:483: kavibhiḥ kṛṣṇe śaśitā tāsu ca nakṣatratā kavitā |
GK19gp23-33u:485: [7] tataś ca nānā-narma-karmaṭhatayā haṭhavattayā ca kṛṣṇena kiṃcid asaṃkoce viracite,
GK19gp23-33u:487: nicolādi-viparyaye ca paricite sāsraṃ bahu vihasya tad iha sarvam eva yathāvat paryācitam ācere |
GK19gp23-33u:488: [8] tad evam ācārya sasukham udaṅ-mukha-gati-caryayā yamunā-tīra-vana-śreṇīṃ śobhayann eṇīdṛśas tāḥ sva-kāntibhir ācakarṣa,
GK19gp23-33u:489: [9] yatra labdha-harṣaś candramasam api nija-dakṣiṇataḥ samākarṣann iva saṅgitayāṅgīcakāra |
GK19gp23-33u:490: [10] tad anu ca sarvābhir arvācīna-yauvanābhis tam ekam anusarantībhir ata eva parasparaṃ saṅgam apariharantībhir,
GK19gp23-33u:493: sa haris tādṛśatām eva parāmṛśati sma-

GK19gp23-33u:498: saukhyaṃ lakṣyam abhūt parāvṛti-vidhāṃ cāveśitā nirmame ||JGc_1,24.5|| [śārdūla]
GK19gp23-33u:501: mālāṃ bibhrad vaijayantīṃ vyacaran maṇḍayan vanam ||[BhP 10.29.44] iti |
GK19gp23-33u:504: jagau gopī-janas tv ekaṃ kṛṣṇa-nāma punaḥ punaḥ ||[ViP 5.13.52]
GK19gp23-33u:505: vidhur ayam āgatavān śaradaṃ prati samprati |
GK19gp23-33u:506: itavān vidhur atha nahi bhavatīḥ prati |
GK19gp23-33u:507: mādhava jaya gokula-vīra jaya jaya kṛṣṇa hare ||a||
GK19gp23-33u:510: keśava jaya hārda-śarīra jaya jaya kṛṣṇa hare ||b||
GK19gp23-33u:513: śyāmala jaya hārda-samīra jaya jaya kṛṣṇa hare ||c||

GK19gp23-33u:517: [14] tad evaṃ gāyate priyāya pratigṛṇatīṣu tāsu nava-yuvatīṣu punaḥ śrī-śuka-vacanāti-rahasyaṃ, yathā-
GK19gp23-33u:526: yathā-tad evaṃ bhrāmaṃ bhrāmaṃ jāta-prasare' py alabdhāvasare sa-tṛṣṇa-kṛṣṇa-sahita-mahita-mahilāvisare' bhilaṣita-vilasitāya viralatā na jātā |
GK19gp23-33u:527: [16] ajātāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ kṛṣṇayā taraṅga-kara-nikara-citam aharahar avakalitaṃ pulina-viśeṣam eva tad-ucitaṃ prabalam avakalayāmāsa |
GK19gp23-33u:528: [17] balānujanmā yaḥ khalu hima-bālukeva bālukā yasmiṃs tādṛśa iti parama-śubhra-śubhra-guṇatayā vibhrājate sma |
GK19gp23-33u:530: [19] yatraiva ca tūlikāvad anukūlikā bālukā vastra-mātram āstaraṇam apekṣate sma;
GK19gp23-33u:531: yatraiva ca kalinda-tanayā svayaṃ valita-sakhīnayā saugandhika-sugandha-gandhavāha-vahanādinā sevāṃ vahati sma |
GK19gp23-33u:532: [20] tatra cātra śrī-keśavaḥ praveśam anubhūya pratipreyasy api yugmībhūya bāhu-prasārādi-līlāṃ śīlayāmāsa |
GK19gp23-33u:533: [21] sā ceyaṃ paramarahasyeti rahasy eva kiñcid vyasyate |
GK19gp23-33u:536: bāhū tu tat-karaṇatāṃ ciram īyatur na |
GK19gp23-33u:537: yo yasya naiti vaśatāṃ sa kathaṃ nu tasya
GK19gp23-33u:539: kṛtaṃ ca parirambhanaṃ na parihartum īśāv amū
GK19gp23-33u:541: kathañcid api vīrudhā bhavati cet taroḥ saṃgamas
GK19gp23-33u:542: tayoḥ katham apṛktatā svayam anīhayor jāyatām? ||JGc_1,24.8|| [pṛthvī]
GK19gp23-33u:545: tayos tāṃ vicchetuṃ param ahaha nānā-vilasita-
GK19gp23-33u:546: pratīkṣā supteva svayam atha jajāgāra paritaḥ ||JGc_1,24.9|| [śikhariṇī]
GK19gp23-33u:556: uru-sparśe niraste' pi nīvīm aspṛkṣad acyutaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:562: vakṣas te kim api nirīkṣyate praphullaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:563: sparśaṃ cāṇv api sahate calākṣi yan na |
GK19gp23-33u:565: syān nīruk tad iti harir jahāsa cātra ||JGc_1,24.14|| [praharṣiṇī][*7]
GK19gp23-33u:566: [*7] This verse does not appear in ca, gha.
GK19gp23-33u:577: svādhīnaṃ sapadi pratisvam asakṛt tatrātigarvaṃ dadhuḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:578: lokaś ced bahu-rāja-rāṣṭra-vasatir jaṅganti bhaṅgaṃ tadā
GK19gp23-33u:579: tasyāntar-hitatā hiteti kila so' py antardadhe mādhavaḥ ||JGc_1,24.17|| [śārdūla]
GK19gp23-33u:581: mama paramam uddeśyam eva vismṛta-deśyam abhūt,
GK19gp23-33u:582: yataḥ sarvābhir eva nirviśeṣaṃ ramamāṇe mayi ramā-śiromaṇīyamānā rādhāpi sādhāraṇatāṃ gatā |
GK19gp23-33u:584: sva-manoratha-prathanāyāṃ rādhāyāḥ prathamā prathamānā-gamanatā samprati pratipannā,
GK19gp23-33u:585: tasmān mahā-maha eva mama hitāya mahīyate |
GK19gp23-33u:586: sa ca śāradatā-viśāradatāyām asyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ rāsa-rasa eva tūrṇaṃ pūrṇatām arhati |
GK19gp23-33u:587: eṣa tu sarvāsām aikamatya-pratipatty-anusārata eva sāratām prasārayati |
GK19gp23-33u:588: aikyamataṃ ca pratyekaṃ sābhimānāntarāsu parāsu kiñcin mad-udāsīnatā-paraṃ dāsī-kartum āsīdati |
GK19gp23-33u:589: tasmād aśeṣa-guṇādhikāṃ rādhikām ādāya tirodhāya sthāsyāmi iti |
GK19gp23-33u:590: [26] tad etad vibhāvya bhāvyam arthaṃ sādhayan,
GK19gp23-33u:591: mādhavas tatra tatrālasa-kara-caraṇādi-kriyāṃ priyāṃ priyāṃ praty uvāca-nūnaṃ vañcita-kāñcī-dhvanitayā kayācid apy atra sthīyata iti nāsthīyate |
GK19gp23-33u:594: mayā tu samayā mṛgayamāṇatāṃ nirmāya nātisamaya-virāmam āgamanīyam |
GK19gp23-33u:595: [27] tad etad abhidhāya, tatas tataḥ sarvataś cāntardhāya rādhayā saha sahasā jagāma |
GK19gp23-33u:596: [28] atha samaya-katipaya-vyatyayam asahamānā sā sā ca tatas tata utthāya prasthāya ca tam anvicchantīti bhramaṇāt kramaśaḥ eka-dvāditayā paramparaṃ militāḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:597: militāś ca tāḥ paramparam apratītitaḥ śapathaṃ prathamānāḥ kṛṣṇa-patham evānveṣayāmāsuḥ | kintu-
GK19gp23-33u:598: anveṣṭuṃ kṛṣṇam iṣṭaṃ nikaṭam abhigataṃ cintayitvā pradūnāḥ
GK19gp23-33u:599: kartuṃ tan naiva śekuḥ param ahaha gatāḥ klāntim etā nipetuḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:600: sthitvā tadvac cirāya sphuraṇa-mayam amuṃ prāpya sarvāḥ samantān
GK19gp23-33u:601: matvānyo' nyaṃ tam eva pratihata-matayaś cakrur āliṅganādi ||JGc_1,24.18|| [sragdharā]
GK19gp23-33u:604: kṛṣṇāyante sma tā eva sarva-pālakatām itāḥ ||JGc_1,24.19|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp23-33u:605_0: [29] atha kathañcid anusaṃhita-bahirarthāḥ samayaṃ gamayitum asamarthāḥ pūrvābhyāsa-vaśān
GK19gp23-33u:605_1: nija-rakṣāyā vaśān nikhila-sukhada-śīlāṃ bālyādi-katal-līlāṃ gātum ārabdhās tad-āveśa-parirabdhā babhūvuḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:606: [30] tatra ca kṛṣṇam anvicchantyas tata ito gacchantyas taru-vallī-pallīm api muhur api pṛcchanti sma,
GK19gp23-33u:612: adyāpi smṛtam uttapaty ahaha mac-cittaṃ yad etā muhuḥ
GK19gp23-33u:613: pṛcchanti sma hariṃ viyoga-vidhurā hā hā tarūn apy aho |
GK19gp23-33u:614: āstāṃ tan mama hṛdy aruntudam idaṃ gītābhir etat-kṛte
GK19gp23-33u:617: yat pṛcchābhiniveśaś caivam apagacchati sma, yathā-
GK19gp23-33u:622: [32] tataś ca kṣitim eva praśna-lakṣitī-kṛtavatyaḥ, yathā-
GK19gp23-33u:623: aho kim akaros tapaḥ kiyad ihorvi yac chrī-hareḥ
GK19gp23-33u:625: trivikramaja-vikramāt kim iva tat tvayā sambhṛtaṃ
GK19gp23-33u:626: varāha-parirambhataḥ kim athavā kvacit kintu na ||JGc_1,24.23|| [pṛthvī]
GK19gp23-33u:627: pṛthvī kṣamā ca nāmnā tvaṃ tat-padāṅkam udaṅkitā |
GK19gp23-33u:628: tasmāt tvām eva taṃ praṣṭuṃ tā vayaṃ gatim āgatāḥ ||JGc_1,24.24|| [anuṣṭubh]
GK19gp23-33u:629: [33] tad evaṃ sarvāsu tarv-ādikaṃ pṛcchantīṣu tata itaś ca gacchantīṣu tadīyaṃ saurabhyaṃ parirabhya,
GK19gp23-33u:631: tad-vaidagdhī-digdha-snigdha-hṛdayā rādhā-sakhī-samudayā hariṇīṃ prati kṛta-praṇayāḥ sānumodatayā hāri vyāharanti sma-
GK19gp23-33u:633: tanvan dṛśāṃ sakhi sunirvṛtim acyuto vaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:640_0: [34] atra khalu eṇeti patnīti sakhīti pada-trayeṇa-he praśasta-netre ! mādṛśa-mānuṣī-sadṛśa-vicāra-saṃcarita-vṛndāvana-kṣetre
GK19gp23-33u:640_1: ! tat-tad-asmadīya-sukha-prakhyeṇa sukhena labdha-mad-vidha-sakhye ! iti vyajya sukha-rajya-māna-hṛdayāḥ prāha-
GK19gp23-33u:641_0: [35] priyayā samam acyutaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ śliṣṭatayā tasyāḥ sakāśād aviśliṣṭaḥ sann adasīya-śobhā-kṛtāsaṅgair

GK19gp23-33u:3595: kṛṣṇaṃ madhya-gataṃ vidhāya pitarau tad-bhrātaraḥ strī-gaṇās
GK19gp23-33u:3597: muñcantaḥ sphuṭam aśru tasya sukhadaṃ cārūpa-cāraṃ ciraṃ
GK19gp23-33u:3598: vismṛtya sthagita-kriyāḥ samabhavan mūkāś ca vaisvaryataḥ ||JGc_1,33.95||
GK19gp23-33u:3599: [212] tvaṃ tu tatra strī-kumāraṃ putra-pautraṃ kubja-vāmanaṃ dāsī-dāsam api sarvaṃ yathāyathaṃ toṣayiṣyasi |
GK19gp23-33u:3600: [213] dārukas tu dāruvad eva dūrasthitas tat-prema-vaśyatayā kautukam iva drakṣyati |
GK19gp23-33u:3601: [214] tataś ca tatrāsīnā paurṇamāsī kupitevālapiṣyati-ahaha kim idam avidanta iva kurvantaḥ stha ?
GK19gp23-33u:3602: pathi pariśrāntam imaṃ katham iva na viśrāntaṃ kurutha |
GK19gp23-33u:3603_1: ubhayataḥ sva-sva-bhajanākṛtāliṅganamaya-praṇaya-ceṣṭitaḥ sarvair eva ca parito veṣṭitaḥ
GK19gp23-33u:3604: [216] tataś ca te sarve bhavat-paricaryā-maya-parisaryākṛtaḥ sambharamam evācariṣyanti,
GK19gp23-33u:3607: yarhy āgantāsy aghahara cirād dvārakātas tadā te
GK19gp23-33u:3610: kurvanto' pi sthagita-kṛtitām eva yāsyanti hanta ||JGc_1,33.97||
GK19gp23-33u:3611: yadyapi gopāḥ samyak paricarituṃ tvāṃ na tarhi śakṣyanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3612: tad api na tat-pramadāmṛta-bhogās tvāmī sadaiva pokṣyanti ||JGc_1,33.98||
GK19gp23-33u:3614: kiṃ bhoktavyaṃ kvāsitavyaṃ svapanīyaṃ kva vāmunā |
GK19gp23-33u:3617: smariṣyanti tu tāṃ tvat-kāṃ punaḥ saṃśleṣa-navyatām ||
GK19gp23-33u:3619: dāsāś ca tava dāśārha punar āśāṃ sva-mūrtiṣu |
GK19gp23-33u:3623: tadvad eva sadaivāmūr dhāsyanti pramadaṃ tvayi ||
GK19gp23-33u:3625: śiśavaḥ paśavaś caiva vayāṃsi ca payāṃsi ca |
GK19gp23-33u:3626: ye' nye hṛdyā janā hṛdyās tava teṣāṃ tu kā kathā ||JGc_1,33.102||
GK19gp23-33u:3627: [218] kūrmasyeva smaraṇānubhāvena tava tena tvadīyāḥ pūrvavad eva hi te sthātāraḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3628: tathaiva vrajād baladevaḥ kuśasthalīm āsādya tvayi nivedayiṣyati |
GK19gp23-33u:3632: upaviṣṭaṃ tadā rāmaṃ papraccha kuśalaṃ vraje |
GK19gp23-33u:3633: bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu goṣu caiva janārdanaḥ ||
GK19gp23-33u:3635: sarveṣāṃ kuśalaṃ kṛṣṇa yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi ||[HV 83.53,55-6] iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3636: [219] tad evaṃ sthite' pi tadā tava sadā vrajāvasthiti-pratītis tu teṣāṃ nātijaniṣyate |
GK19gp23-33u:3637: syandanaṃ tad atra tad-avastham eva sthāpitam astīty anāsthā-bhāvanayā |
GK19gp23-33u:3638: [220] kiṃ ca, tava savayasaḥ pravayasaḥ pratīdaṃ pratīpam āvedayiṣyanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3640: yato janitānurāga-janatāsu tāsu prāg iva nānurāgaṃ jāgaram āgamayati |
GK19gp23-33u:3641: tāś ca tathā dṛṣṭvā lagita-duḥkha-sthagitatayā śuṣkā iva tiṣṭhanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3642: [221] tad etad ākarṇayantaḥ prāpta-kadanāntaratayā vivarṇavadanānte tvan-mātara-pitarādayaḥ kātaratām avāpsyanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3643: [222] tvaṃ tu jantu-mātra-citta-jñas tad vijñāya svayam eva tān vijñāpayiṣyasi-kathaṃ bhavanto nādyāpy ānandād udbhavanto dṛśyante |
GK19gp23-33u:3644: [223] sarve tu sagadgadaṃ gadiṣyanti-asmākam ānanda-kāraṇaṃ tvad-avadhāraṇa-padavīṃ vindata eva |
GK19gp23-33u:3645: [224] atha tvaṃ vakṣyasi-bāḍhaṃ kintu yena bhavadbhiḥ sandihyate,
GK19gp23-33u:3646: so' yaṃ śatāṅgaḥ sāṅga-bhavat-kārya-saṅgamanāya saṅge rakṣitatayā lakṣyate |
GK19gp23-33u:3648: etad eva prāg eva niveditaṃ mayā-
GK19gp23-33u:3649: yāta yūyaṃ vrajaṃ tāta vayaṃ ca sneha-duḥkhitān |
GK19gp23-33u:3650: jñātīn vo draṣṭum eṣyāmo vidhāya suhṛdāṃ sukham ||[BhP 10.45.23] iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3651: [225] jñātīn iti yuṣman-madhyata evāsau vāsaḥ sambhaviṣyati,
GK19gp23-33u:3652: draṣṭum iti tatra ca yuṣmad-darśanam evāsmākaṃ puruṣārtha ity arthaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3653: yad vā draṣṭum iti darśana-viṣayī-bhavitum ity arthaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3654: athāpi bhūman mahimā guṇasya te viboddhum arhaty amalāntarātmabhiḥ [BhP 10.14.6] ity atra bodha-viṣayī-bhavitum itivad etad uddhavena ca bhavatsu samudbuddhaṃ cakre-
GK19gp23-33u:3656: priyaṃ vidhāsyate pitror bhagavān sātvatāṃ patiḥ ||
GK19gp23-33u:3658: yad āha vaḥ samāgatya kṛṣṇaḥ satyaṃ karoti tat ||[BhP 10.46.34-5] iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3659: [226] sātvatāṃ patir api pūrṇa-ṣaḍaiśvarya-sampattir api pitror yuvayor vrajeśitroḥ parama-sukha-śriyaṃ sadā svalālanā-rūpaṃ priyaṃ vidhāsyate |
GK19gp23-33u:3661: yatas tat tato hetor adyāpi satyaṃ śapathaṃ karoti,
GK19gp23-33u:3663: tad anenaiva nayena bhavatāṃ praṇayarṇaṃ vinayeya, na tu manāg api gamanāgastvena | tathā hi-
GK19gp23-33u:3665: duḥkhāt kaṃsa-vināśanārtham agamaṃ śīghrāṃ nivṛttiṃ vidan |
GK19gp23-33u:3667: caivaṃ tad-vyasanaṃ samāpya yadi ca prāgāṃ kva vā yāmy aham ||JGc_1,33.103|| iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3668: [227] tataḥ śrī-vrajeśvarānumatyā pratyāsannāḥ sarve' pi prārthayiṣyante |
GK19gp23-33u:3669: evaṃ ced iha ca tava dvārakā-vad eva bahala-gṛha-bṛṃhaṇāya spṛhayāmaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3670: anyathā-karaṇaṃ tu yad asmākam adhanyatāṃ vahatīti |
GK19gp23-33u:3671: [228] tad etad ākarṇya bhūmiṃ nirvarṇya tvaṃ tu tasminn asantuṣṭa iva cetasi cintayitāsi-gṛha-śabdaḥ khalv ebhir gṛhiṇī-paryāyatayā paryavasāyitaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3672: tatra ca hanta mama svāntaṃ kīdṛśaṃ vāmī vidhāsyantīti |
GK19gp23-33u:3674: pūrṇa-jñāna-tūrṇa-vidhānā ca paurṇamāsy atra sarvaṃ śarma nirmāsyati,
GK19gp23-33u:3677: tarhi rohiṇī-mātā rauhiṇeya-bhrātā ca dvārakāgārād ākāraṇīyau |
GK19gp23-33u:3679: [230] atha punar dāruka-sārathiṃ prati prathayiṣyasi-bho sārathe ! sarathaḥ prathamānayātyantīnatayā bhavān yadu-bhavanam āsādya sadyaḥ śrīmad-bhrātaraṃ tan-mātaraṃ ca prāpayeti |
GK19gp23-33u:3680: punar vicārya vakṣyasi-hanta ! tam uddhavam apy ānayeti |
GK19gp23-33u:3681_0: [231] tatas tad-vandanāruke dāruke pavanam anuharamāṇena yānena muhūrta-mātrārdhatais
GK19gp23-33u:3681_1: taiḥ sārdham āgate tasmin vismita-manasaḥ śrīman-nandādayaḥ paramānandāśayatayā sahasā
GK19gp23-33u:3681_2: bhavad-āgamanavad eva sahasā mahasā todyamānātodya-vrajaṃ tan-nijālayam āneṣyanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3682: [232] gateṣu ca dineṣu tri-catureṣu rāmādayas te vrajasthābhir ucitam eva tubhyaṃ rocayiṣyanti-
GK19gp23-33u:3683: yeṣāṃ prema-guṇair yas tvaṃ baddhaḥ suṣṭhutayā hariḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3684: tasya tair viniruddhā ye kuryus te katham anyathā ||JGc_1,33.104||
GK19gp23-33u:3685: [233] sarve ca militvā nirṇeṣyanti mānyāḥ kanyā-vicāram |
GK19gp23-33u:3686: kātyāyanyārādhikās tāḥ kanyā dhanyādayaḥ sanyāyatām arhantīti |
GK19gp23-33u:3687: [234] rāmoddhavau tu parama-niṣṇātau kṛṣṇavaj jñātvā tūṣṇīm evāvasthāsyataḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3688: [235] tatas tad-artham ārambhe labdha-sambhede vraja-pati-jampatī pūrṇa-mano-gatī pūrṇimābhyarṇam āsādya sadyas tasyāṃ varivasyā-pūrvakaṃ sarvaṃ nivedayiṣyataḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3690: kintu varyāḥ parama-varyā rādhādayaḥ kathaṃ vā na svīkāryāḥ ?
GK19gp23-33u:3691: [237] tau tu sa-vailakṣyaṃ vakṣyataḥ-kāḥ khalu rādhikādy-abhidhāḥ ?
GK19gp23-33u:3693: punas tau vakṣyataḥ-sudhy-ādi-guro ! na budhyāmahe | niḥśodhyaṃ tu bodhyatām |
GK19gp23-33u:3694: sā tu sa-hāsaṃ vakṣyati-yathā kātyāyany-ārādhikānāṃ kanyātvam evam anyāsāṃ rādhikādikānām api |
GK19gp23-33u:3697: sā vakṣyati-bhavantaḥ khalv idaṃ nānubhavanta iva santi |
GK19gp23-33u:3698: yat punar adyāpi kanyā eva tā dhanyāḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3701: yasmān maryādālaṅghana-paryāyatayā tā eva ca śayyādau paryavasāyante iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3702: kiṃ tad idaṃ kiñcana bhavantāv anu sa-vedanaṃ nivedayāmi |
GK19gp23-33u:3703: tās tad ekānuraktā mādṛśa-sāntvanayā param adyāvadhi dhairya-sampṛktāḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3705: tāsāṃ tad idaṃ na kevalam aham eva vidaty asmi, kintu sarvāpi vraja-janatā |
GK19gp23-33u:3706: tac ca pūrvam api kiñcit kiñcid viśeṣtas tu kṛṣṇa-kṛta-vṛṣṇi-sthāna-prasthāna-gata-tad-anavasthāvasthāyām |
GK19gp23-33u:3708: [238] tatra pūrvaṃ yathā-kuja-gatiṃ gamitā na vidāmaḥ;
GK19gp23-33u:3709: kaśmalena kavaraṃ vasanaṃ vā [BhP 10.35.17] ity ādinā |
GK19gp23-33u:3711: nivārayāmaḥ samupetya mādhavaṃ; kiṃ no ækariṣyan kula-vṛddha-bāndhavāḥ [BhP 10.39.28] ity uktvā,
GK19gp23-33u:3712: visṛjya lajjāṃ ruruduḥ sma su-svaraṃ; govinda dāmodara mādhaveti [BhP 10.39.31] ity ādinā,
GK19gp23-33u:3713: kṛṣṇa-dūte samāyāte uddhave tyakta-laukikāḥ [BhP 10.47.9] ity ādinā,
GK19gp23-33u:3715: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ bhrātṝn patīn putrān svasṝn api |
GK19gp23-33u:3716: yad-arthe jahima dāśārha dustyajān sva-janān prabho ||[BhP 10.65.11] ity ādinā,
GK19gp23-33u:3717: yā dustyajaṃ svajanam ārya-pathaṃ ca hitvā ity ādinā ca |
GK19gp23-33u:3718: [239] atra patīn putrān iti yad uktaṃ,
GK19gp23-33u:3719: tat khalu gauṇīm eva vṛttim anukramya,
GK19gp23-33u:3720: na tu mukhyām iti bhavat-praśnānukrameṇa prakhyāsāmi |
GK19gp23-33u:3722: tary evam ācakṣmahe-narakādānīta-guru-kumāratayā jita-dharmarāja-dhāmā rājad-aghajin-nāmā so' yam etad anurakta-jano' py adharmasya kalayāpi spraṣṭuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca na śakyata eva |
GK19gp23-33u:3723_0: kintu lajjā-mātraṃ tasya tasya ca maryādā-paryāpakam iti vastutas tu na kevalaṃ rāgata
GK19gp23-33u:3723_1: eva tās tādṛśīṃ gati-mārgatāḥ kintv anādi-siddha-svabhāvatayā tad-vadhū-bhāvataś
GK19gp23-33u:3724: tad etad balarāmoddhavau ca suṣṭhu jānīta iti tāv api praṣṭavyau,
GK19gp23-33u:3725: anyathā tāsu tat-sandeśa-haratā tayor na deśa-rūpatām āsīdet |
GK19gp23-33u:3726: [240] punas tau vakṣyataḥ-vatsaḥ kim idam anusandadhāti ?
GK19gp23-33u:3727: sā vakṣyati-sa ca pūrvaṃ kiñcid anusaṃhitavān āsīt |
GK19gp23-33u:3730: tau vakṣyataḥ-tāsāṃ tad-artha-prāṇa-jihāsāṃ kim asau jānāti?
GK19gp23-33u:3731: sā vakṣyati-uktam eva samyag vidann āsta iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3732: [241] yataḥ pūrvam apy uddhave tathā samudbuddhaṃ kṛtavān,
GK19gp23-33u:3733: yathā ca tad-vacanaṃ satya-vacasaś ca gāsyanti-
GK19gp23-33u:3734: gacchoddhava vrajaṃ saumya pitror nau prītim āvaha |
GK19gp23-33u:3737: mām eva dayitaṃ preṣṭham ātmānaṃ manasā gatāḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3738: ye tyakta-loka-dharmāś ca mad-arthe tān bibharmy aham ||
GK19gp23-33u:3739: mayi tāḥ preyasāṃ preṣṭhe dūra-sthe gokula-striyaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3743: [242] atra mat-sandeśaiḥ iti mayy āveśya manaḥ kṛṣṇe vimuktāśeṣa-vṛtti yat anusmarantyo māṃ nityam acirān mām upaiṣyatha [BhP 10.47.36] iti paryavasānair ity arthaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3745: me vallavyaḥ ity atra tu viśeṣo' py asti,
GK19gp23-33u:3746: tasmāt tad eka-vrata-jīvana-vratānāṃ tad-bhāryāṇāṃ nānyā gatir nyāyyā |
GK19gp23-33u:3749: satyam asmākaṃ prakaṭatare' pi loka-dharma-ghaṭanānarha-pratikāre' pi tāsāṃ vighaṭana-duḥkhe yad adyāpi snuṣākaraṇa-spṛhā nāpayāti,
GK19gp23-33u:3750: pratyuta sātatyata eva tāsu snuṣābhānaṃ vibhāti |
GK19gp23-33u:3754: [245] atha tau spaṣṭaṃ vakṣyataḥ-rahasyam idaṃ lokāḥ kathaṃ maṃsyante |
GK19gp23-33u:3755: sā vakṣyati-māyāyāḥ svabhāva-vyāpitir iyam avyabhicāritayā lakṣyate,
GK19gp23-33u:3758: [246] yataḥ sarveṣām api sat-saṅkalpānām upari prabhavator bhavator nigūḍhā yā tad-artham utkaṇṭhā,
GK19gp23-33u:3759: sā hy adhunā parāṃ koṭim ārūḍhā jhaṭiti rūḍha-kāryā bhaved eva |
GK19gp23-33u:3760: tau vakṣyataḥ-svīyām ananya-sambandhitāṃ tāḥ kathaṃ vidanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3761: [247] sā vakṣyati-pūrvaṃ sa vo hi svāmī bhavati iti durvāsaso vacanenāpi samyaṅ nāviduḥ kintu paścād viduḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3764: ataevoktam-api bata madhu-puryām ārya-putro ædhunāste [BhP 10.47.21] iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3765: [250] tau vakṣyataḥ-tāsāṃ śvaśuraṃ-manyādīnāṃ ye' nugatās te prāyeṇānutāpaṃ prāpsyanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3766: [251] atha sā tu puruṣam iva vakṣyati-tat kim āsāṃ parama-sādhvīnāṃ mādhvīkavan madhura-snigdhatāvalitānāṃ duṣkara-taraṇa-duḥkha-bhāskara-puṣkalatāpa-śuṣkatā soḍhavyā |
GK19gp23-33u:3767: tathā sarva-dhurīṇatā-pravīṇasya nija-kula-dhurandharasya govardhana-dharasya durdhara-lajjā-bhāra-sajjanam anumodanīyam |
GK19gp23-33u:3768: vastutas tu teṣām api na sukha-bhaṅga-prasaṅgaḥ yad-dhāmārtha-suhṛt-priyātma-tanaya-prāṇāśayās tvat-kṛte [BhP 10.14.35] iti śrī-śuka-vacanād api |
GK19gp23-33u:3769: tathā ca na vacana-marmābhir ācaraṇīyam, yathā sarva-sukha-sacanam eva syāt |
GK19gp23-33u:3770: [252] tad etan nirūpya sā punaḥ sahāsaṃ vakṣyati-sāmprataṃ pratataṃ kutukāntaraṃ bhavadvyāṃ kila nāvakalitam |
GK19gp23-33u:3771: yat khalu yuṣman-nandana ānanda-dyūte tāsāṃ patiṃmanyāṃst tat-pitrādi-paryantaṃ sarvaṃ jitavān |
GK19gp23-33u:3772: lajjām eva sajjan na tad-gṛham ānītavān iti |
GK19gp23-33u:3773: [253] tad idaṃ guptam api kṛtam ādi-varāha-nāmā bhagavān api sva-purāṇe sākṣitayā lakṣayatīti sarvathātra nānyathā mantavyam | yathā-
GK19gp23-33u:3777: [254] tau vakṣyataḥ-tat-pitrādīnāṃ tan-mitrādīnāṃ vā ko vyavasāyaḥ ?
GK19gp23-33u:3778: [255] sā vakṣyati-te' pi mayopadiṣṭaṃ tattvīkṛtya pṛṣṭa-kṛtyās tad idam uddiṣṭavantaḥ-
GK19gp23-33u:3784: [257] sā vakṣyati-mat-pṛṣṭābhis tābhir apy evam ādiṣṭam-
GK19gp23-33u:3787: tathā rādhādīnāṃ para-gṛha-gatir yā bata vipat
GK19gp23-33u:3788: kathaṃ tasyā nityā sthitir abhimatā hanta suhṛdām ||JGc_1,33.106|| [*9]
GK19gp23-33u:3789: [*9] This verse is repeated in Uttara-campū, 31.43.
GK19gp23-33u:3790: [258] tau vakṣyataḥ-atha rādhikādīnām ārtānāṃ kā vārtā ?
GK19gp23-33u:3792: deyam adhīnaṃ kārtsnyenābhivyāptyā ca tatra kṛṣṇe svam |
GK19gp23-33u:3796: yatas tāsāṃ marma-prakaṭana-karmaṭhatayā mayā pṛṣṭam-bho vipaścitaḥ kāścid evaṃ vadanti |
GK19gp23-33u:3798: premā ca balavad virodhi-sad-bhāva-milad-bhaya-prayāsa-pracchādana-paricchadatayā yathā vardhate, na tathānyathā |

GK19gp23-33u:3985: [325] bhavān vakṣyati-sarvathā sarveṣām ādṛtyās tatra-bhavatāṃ bhṛtyās tatra pradyumnādayaḥ pradyotanta eva |
GK19gp23-33u:3986: tathāpi bhavatām apūrtiś cet tadā bhavad-ārādhana-śatayāsman-mūrti-vyūham api tatra nārāyaṇaḥ pārayiṣyati |
GK19gp23-33u:3987: [326] punar vraja-rājo vakṣyati-rohiṇī-rāmavad ayam uddhavaś cāsmad-eka-sampad-uddhavas tasmād ayam api tathācaraṇīyaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3988: [327] bhavān vakṣyati-yatra bhavad-icchā, tad vā kiṃ na setsyati ? kintv ājñāntaraṃ jñāpaya |
GK19gp23-33u:3989: [328] vrajarājo vakṣyati-jaivātṛka ! bhavatām akrūrādi-racitenāticiraṃ bhavatā viraheṇa cirāya tarv-antimaḥ sarva eva jīvaḥ suṣṭhu durjīvanam avāpi |
GK19gp23-33u:3991: tatas tvad-viraha-parihārāya nānya-jana-locana-gocaraḥ syām iti prārthayate |
GK19gp23-33u:3993: [329] bhavān vakṣyati-hanta ! vṛndāvana eva tādṛśaṃ prakāśa-vṛndaṃ vartate |
GK19gp23-33u:3994: yat khalu brahma-hrade nimajjya punas tasmād unmajjya ca bhavadbhiḥ pūrvam apy apūrvaṃ dṛṣṭam asti |
GK19gp23-33u:3997: [330] vraja-rājo vakṣyati-vatsa! tad eva pracchannaṃ vanaṃ gacchāmaḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:3998: [331] tataḥ sa-pratiśrava-śravaṇaṃ bhavān vakṣyati-yathā mahecchānām icchā tathaiva setsyati |
GK19gp23-33u:3999: punaś ca tiryag avekṣya pārśva-lakṣyaṃ dārukam ādekṣyasi-sārathe ! tathā rathaṃ prathaya,
GK19gp23-33u:4000: yathā sarva eva vrajas tatrāntar-bhavaṃs tad-dhāma praviśaṃś ca dhāma-grāmataḥ svar-vāsinām api dṛg-ārāmatāṃ nāsīdati |
GK19gp23-33u:4001: [332] atha tena sūtena tu tathākṛta-prathe rathe sarva eva vraja-prāṇi-vrajaḥ svairaṃ nivśamānas taṃ deśaṃ praviveśa |
GK19gp23-33u:4004: carmākṣā menire tarhy uparigatatayā tat-padopāsakāś ca |
GK19gp23-33u:4005: kṛṣṭvā brahma-hradāt prāg api murajayinā lambhitā gomino yā
GK19gp23-33u:4006: tāṃ vṛndāraṇya-madhye gatim iha sugatās tadvidaś cārv apaśyan ||JGc_1,33.119||
GK19gp23-33u:4007: tatra parjanya-varyāś ca ye gatāḥ prāg-adṛśyatām |
GK19gp23-33u:4008: drakṣyante te' pi tatraiva tad āścaryaṃ bhaviṣyati ||JGc_1,33.120||
GK19gp23-33u:4013: śrī-gopī-prāṇa-sāraḥ sa jayati nitarāṃ gopa-goptuḥ kumāraḥ ||JGc_1,33.121||
GK19gp23-33u:4015: [335] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tad evam anyaṃ ca vṛttāntaṃ varṇitavān |
GK19gp23-33u:4016_0: śrīmān vraja-sukha-varṣī devarṣiś ca parasparaṃ harṣitāṃ prapannaḥ sa-bāṣpa-romaharṣādhibhiḥ
GK19gp23-33u:4016_1: sampannaḥ snigdha-saṃvāda-vicchedataḥ parikhidya śanair eva ca vicchidya sva-sva-varmānuvartate sma |
GK19gp23-33u:4017: śrīmad-vrajendra-nandanas tu tat-kathā-paryantānandena paryāptaḥ sarvaṃ tad-duḥkha-jātam ācchannatām āpannam eva cakāra |
GK19gp23-33u:4018: tatra bhagavantaḥ śrī-devarṣi-caraṇā yad-yad-bhāvitayā samudbhāvitavantas tat sarvam abhūd eva |
GK19gp23-33u:4020_1: svalpa-kālatām āpakam āyādhīnānāṃ tad-āgamanāśayā bahir evāsīnānāṃ tad-iṣṭa-siddhir indhāmbabhūveti |
GK19gp23-33u:4021: [337] tad evam ākarṇya sarve' pi sabhāsadaḥ procuḥ- tatas tataḥ ?
GK19gp23-33u:4022_0: [338] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-tataś ca sarva-sukhārāmābhyāṃ śrī-rohiṇīm ābhyāṃ gopocita-veṣādy-abhiniveśa-labdha-sakhi-gaṇa-praveśoddhavenoddhavena
GK19gp23-33u:4022_1: ca sārdham asminn eva goloka-nāmake parama-duravaloke loke parama-vibhavavatāṃ bhavatāṃ
GK19gp23-33u:4022_2: madhye vibhavann eva so' yaṃ virājate |
GK19gp23-33u:4023: [339] punaḥ sarve' py ūcuḥ- tatas tataḥ ?
GK19gp23-33u:4024_1: vayam apy āgamya bhavad-bhavadīya-kṛpā-mātra-gamyaṃ ramyaṃ vāsa-varyam ajarya-saṅgamam āsādayāma |
GK19gp23-33u:4026: [342] madhukaṇṭha uvāca-pūrvaṃ tāvad asmadīyānāṃ duṣprārabdha-vaśād adya śvaś cicaliṣa-yātrāsu yātrāyāṃ vilambanam āsīt |
GK19gp23-33u:4027: tatra ca sati śrīmad-vraja-prāṇasya yaduṣu saṅkramaṇam avakarṇya prāṇa-viyojanam ivāsīt |
GK19gp23-33u:4028_0: cirāya tu vraje tat-prati-saṅkramaṇaṃ cākarṇya sadyaś calitum udyame kṛta-prakrame
GK19gp23-33u:4028_1: tad-anugata-vraja-janasya tasya martya-loka-pathād antardhānam avadhārya vāridhi-praveśam
GK19gp23-33u:4029_0: jāte cāgamane tat-tat-padaṃ kṛṣṇa-rūpya-krīḍāspadatayā nirūpya mūrcchānantaraṃ jāgaram
GK19gp23-33u:4029_1: ṛcchatām asmākam akasmād atrānupraveśaḥ kathaṃ jāta iti na yathātathyaṃ prathayituṃ śakyate sma |
GK19gp23-33u:4031_1: krameṇa ca bhavad-upasevanāya śrī-gopāla-pūrva-campūṃ sampūrṇayantas tad idaṃ sudināham
GK19gp23-33u:4032: [345] tad etad uktvā samāpanam idaṃ padyaṃ nigadya paṇāyati sma-
GK19gp23-33u:4033: so' yaṃ gopendra putras tava mahita-mahīyaḥsu śaśvan-mahīyyas
GK19gp23-33u:4036: dūraṃ dhāma prabhāvaṃ vibhavam api mahā-prema-mādhuryam atra ||JGc_1,33.122||
GK19gp23-33u:4037: [346] tad etad uktvā bhrātaraṃ praty uvāca-
GK19gp23-33u:4038: gopāla-yaśasā spṛṣṭaṃ yan mṛṣṭaṃ sūta-janma ca |
GK19gp23-33u:4039: tat tu sparśa-maṇer jātaṃ jāta-rūpa-mayo' pi naḥ ||JGc_1,33.123||
GK19gp23-33u:4042: sādhye śrī-harir eṣa rāma-sahitaḥ pratyakṣatām āgataḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:4043: tatrāpi sva-kathā-prathāṃ kathayituṃ naḥ samyag ādiṣṭavān
GK19gp23-33u:4044: kāruṇyaṃ kim athāsya varṇyam asakṛt puṇyaṃ ca kiṃ naḥ sakhe ||JGc_1,33.124||
GK19gp23-33u:4045_1: punar arjunatām arjayann iva tataś ca stambha-sambha-janam atigambhīra-kampa-sampat-sampatana-sāmpratatayā
GK19gp23-33u:4045_2: lumpan patann iva punaś ca nirnimiṣatā-nirmita-suparvatām ātmani parvan pūrvāvasthām
GK19gp23-33u:4045_5: sa madhukaṇṭhaḥ pūrvavad eva pūrva-deva-mātrā-ruci-karaṃvaraṃ varayāmāsa-
GK19gp23-33u:4047: hastau santata-sevanaṃ hṛdayam apy utkaṇṭhayā dhāraṇam |
GK19gp23-33u:4049: preṣṭhānāṃ sthiti-vīkṣaṇaṃ ca bhajatāṃ nau naiva tat-tad-bahiḥ ||JGc_1,33.125||
GK19gp23-33u:4050: [348] tad evaṃ labdha-bhakti-prapañcaṃ taṃ ca taṃ ca kuñcan-manasaṃ bhūyo bhūya āhūya pramada-vraja-virājamānaḥ śrīmān vrajarājaḥ sabhājana-bhājanatayā nija-samīpam āpayāmāsa,
GK19gp23-33u:4052: tena ca sarvam api samājaṃ śarmaṇā bhrājayāmāsa |
GK19gp23-33u:4057: etāny anyaiḥ samarpya dvayam abhihitavān śrīla-goloka-rājaḥ ||JGc_1,33.126||
GK19gp23-33u:4059: asya mātrā tathā mātā tadvat pitrā mayā pitā ||JGc_1,33.127||
GK19gp23-33u:4061: yathā bata sadaḥ-sadastad avagāhya bāhyaṃ gṛham |
GK19gp23-33u:4063: sthalaṃ kila kṛta-kriyaṃ vyasṛjad ātma-labdhān janān ||JGc_1,33.128||
GK19gp23-33u:4064_0: [349] tad evaṃ kathā-sātau datta-sātau madhukaṇṭha-snigdhakaṇṭhau sadaiva labdha-kṛṣṇopakaṇṭhau
GK19gp23-33u:4064_1: ca tad-vilāsa-vilokanotkaṇṭhau pratikṣaṇam amanda-paramānandam anuvindamānāv eva virājete |
GK19gp23-33u:4065_0: [350] atra pūrvam āpātataḥ sudurbodhatāśaṅkayā yadyapi na varṇitās tathāpy asyāṃ
GK19gp23-33u:4065_2: sukhākṛta-sarva-svajanaḥ sarveṣām agraṇyaḥ śrīmān parjanyaḥ parjanya iva sarva-sukhaṃ varṣann āsīt |
GK19gp23-33u:4066: varīyasī varīyasī cāntaḥ-sabhāyāṃ tathā labdha-prabhā samavartata |
GK19gp23-33u:4067: śrīmān uddhavaś ca sarveṣām uddhava evājanīti sarva-janīnaṃ sukhaṃ kiyad varṇanīyam ?
GK19gp23-33u:4070: ekā rādhābhidhā sā vibhavati satataḥ divya-saugandhika-śrīḥ |
GK19gp23-33u:4071: bhrāmyan yām eva labdhuṃ vrajapati-tanayaś cāvarmūr vartama-vṛttīḥ
GK19gp23-33u:4072: sarvā nirmāya yasyām alir iva kalayā kelim uccais tanoti ||JGc_1,33.129||
GK19gp23-33u:4077: jātaṃ yarhi tadākhilaṃ vilikhitā gopāla-campūr iyam |
GK19gp23-33u:4078: vṛndā-kānanam āśritena laghunā jīvena kenāpi tad
GK19gp23-33u:4079: vṛndā-kānanam eva sambhṛti-kalāṃ dhattāṃ samantād iha ||2||
GK19gp23-33u:4080: prāyaḥ sarvā harer līlāḥ kramaśaḥ sūcitā mayā |
